body_html: So far there is no way to mix different types of gpu using some kind of load balancing? Or tensorflow does not support GPU of different types? I have 2 TitanX and 2 1080TI, very similar to the situation above.
body_text: So far there is no way to mix different types of gpu using some kind of load balancing? Or tensorflow does not support GPU of different types? I have 2 TitanX and 2 1080TI, very similar to the situation above.
body: So far there is no way to mix different types of gpu using some kind of load balancing? Or tensorflow does not support GPU of different types? I have 2 TitanX and 2 1080TI, very similar to the situation above.
